 +--- -+--- -+--- -+--- -+--- -+
 |    | 1   | 2   | 3   | 4   | 5   |
 +--- -+--- -+--- -+--- -+--- -+
 | 1   | R  | T  | X  | F  | S  |
 | 2   | W  | C  | M  | V  | H  |
 | 3   | Z  | J  | A  | P  | B  |
 | 4   | L  | Q  | Y  | G  | K  |
 | 5   | N  | E  | U  | D  | I  |
 +--- -+--- -+--- -+--- -+--- -+
"""

plaintext = "X"

ciphertext = ""
for char in plaintext:

        row = (Polybius_square.index(char)+1) // 5 + 1
        col = (Polybius_square.index(char)+1) % 5
        if col == 0:
            col = 5
        ciphertext += f"{row}{col}"
    elif char == "O":
        ciphertext += "66"
    else:
        ciphertext += char

f'[[{ciphertext}]]'
